title: HOUR 1 - Bruce Arians, Tom Brady, Lakers
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Bruce Arians, Tom Brady, Lakers
description:
Bruce Arians is retiring as the Bucs head coach

Tom Brady has the power just like other star QBs

LeBron James may have to start playing with younger teammates or be traded


Guest: Eric Mangini

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
